Predicate.Description: If CWE_CRE.3 (Name of Coding System) is not an HL7 defined table or user defined
If CWE_CRE.1 (Identifier) and CWE.4_CRE (alternate identifier) are not valued.
If CWE_CRE1.3 (Name of Coding System) is not an HL7 defined table or user defined.
If CWE_CRE1.1 (Identifier) and CWE.4_CRE (alternate identifier) are not valued.
If CWE_CR.3 (Name of Coding System) is not an HL7 defined table or user defined.
If CWE_CR1.3 (Name of Coding System) is not an HL7 defined table or user defined.
If EI_NG.3 (Universal ID) is not valued.
If EI_NG.2 (Namespace ID) is not valued.
If HD_NG.2 (Universal ID) is not valued.
If HD_NG.1 (Namespace ID) is not valued.
If XON_GU.1 (Organization Name) is not valued.
If XON_NG.1 (Organization Name) is not valued.
If OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) is valued "G".
If CWE_CRE.1 (Identifier) or CWE_CRE.4 (Alternate Identifier) of at least one occurrence of OBR-49 (Result Handling) is valued 'CC' or 'BCC'
: If OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) is valued "G".
If OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) is valued "G".
If CWE_CRE.1 (Identifier) or CWE_CRE.4 (Alternate Identifier) of at least one occurrence of OBR-49 (Result Handling) is valued 'CC' or 'BCC'
: If OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) is valued "G".
If OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) is valued "G".
If CWE_CRE.1 (Identifier) or CWE_CRE.4 (Alternate Identifier) of at least one occurrence of OBR-49 (Result Handling) is valued 'CC' or 'BCC'
: If OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) is valued "G".
If OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) is valued "G".
If CWE_CRE.1 (Identifier) or CWE_CRE.4 (Alternate Identifier) of at least one occurrence of OBR-49 (Result Handling) is valued 'CC' or 'BCC'
: If OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) is valued "G".
If OBR-25 (Result Status) is valued 'A', 'C', 'F', 'P', or 'M'.
If MSA-1 (Message Acknowledgement) is not valued 'AA' or 'CA'.

Constraint.Description: EI_GU.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
EI_GU.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" drawn from the code system HL70301.
HD_GU.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
HD_GU.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" drawn from the code system HL70301.
TS_0 SHALL be precise to the year
TS_1 SHALL be precise to the second
TS_2 SHALL be precise to the year
TS_3 SHALL be precise to the year
TS_4 SHALL be valued "0000" OR be precise to the day
TS_5 SHALL be precise to the day
TS_6 SHALL be precise to the minute
XAD-9 (County/Parish Code) SHALL be a five-digit code.
If XAD-6 (Country Code) is valued 'USA' or not valued, then XAD-5 (Zip or Postal Code) SHALL be a valid USPS postal code.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-9.1 (Message Type.Message Code) SHALL contain the constant value 'ORU' drawn from the code systems HL70076.
MSH-9.2 (Message Type.Event Trigger) SHALL contain the constant value 'R01' drawn from the code systems HL70003.
MSH-9.3 (Message Type.Message Structure) SHALL contain the constant value 'ORU_R01' drawn from the code system HL70354.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID.Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1' drawn from code system HL70104.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-9.1 (Message Type.Message Code) SHALL contain the constant value 'ORU' drawn from the code systems HL70076.
MSH-9.2 (Message Type.Event Trigger) SHALL contain the constant value 'R01' drawn from the code systems HL70003.
MSH-9.3 (Message Type.Message Structure) SHALL contain the constant value 'ORU_R01' drawn from the code system HL70354.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID.Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1' drawn from code system HL70104.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'ACK^R01^ACK'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'ACK^R01^ACK'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'ACK^R01^ACK'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'ACK^R01^ACK'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.
PID-1 (Set ID - PID) SHALL be valued with the constant value '1'.
PID-1 (Set ID - PID) SHALL be valued with the constant value '1'.
If present, OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time) SHALL be equal to or later than OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time).
If OBR-4.3(Name of Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBR-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If OBR-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBR-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If present, OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time) SHALL be equal to or later than OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time).
If OBR-4.3(Name of Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBR-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If OBR-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBR-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If present, OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time) SHALL be equal to or later than OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time).
If OBR-4.3(Name of Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBR-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If OBR-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBR-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If present, OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time) SHALL be equal to or later than OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time).
If OBR-4.3(Name of Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBR-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If OBR-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBR-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
The value of TQ1-1 (Set ID - TQ1) SHALL be valued '1'.
If OBX-3.3 (Name of Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBX-3.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If OBX-3.6 (Name of Alternate coding System) is valued 'LN', OBX-3.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If OBX-2 is valued 'CWE' and OBX-5.3 (Name of Coding System) is valued 'SCT', OBX-5.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
If OBX-2 is value 'CWE' and OBX-5.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'SCT', OBX-5.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
If OBX-3.3 (Name of Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBX-3.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If OBX-3.6 (Name of Alternate coding System) is valued 'LN', OBX-3.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If OBX-2 is valued 'CWE' and OBX-5.3 (Name of Coding System) is valued 'SCT', OBX-5.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
If OBX-2 is value 'CWE' and OBX-5.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'SCT', OBX-5.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
NTE.1 (Set ID - NTE) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1' within a given segment group.
If SPM-4.3 (Name of Coding System) is valued 'SCT', SPM-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
If SPM-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'SCT', SPM-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
If SPM-4.3 (Name of Coding system) is valued 'HL70487', SPM-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid code identifier drawn from the HL70487_USL.3 value set.
If SPM-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'HL70487', SPM-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid code identifier drawn from the HL70487_USL.3 value set.
When present, either SPM-4.3 (Specimen Type.Name of Coding System) or SPM-4.6 (Specimen Type.Name of Alternate Coding System) SHALL be valued 'SCT', 'HL70487', 'L' or '99zzz' for a local code system.
If SPM-4.3 (Name of Coding System) is valued 'SCT', SPM-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
If SPM-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'SCT', SPM-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
If SPM-4.3 (Name of Coding system) is valued 'HL70487', SPM-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid code identifier drawn from the HL70487_USL.3 value set.
If SPM-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'HL70487', SPM-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid code identifier drawn from the HL70487_USL.3 value set.
When present, either SPM-4.3 (Specimen Type.Name of Coding System) or SPM-4.6 (Specimen Type.Name of Alternate Coding System) SHALL be valued 'SCT', 'HL70487', 'L' or '99zzz' for a local code system.

Results with a Parent/Child relationship (as defined in Section 8.1 Parent/Child Reporting for Reflex and Culture/Susceptibility Testing), such as Microbiology and Reflex Results MUST provide proper linking from the Child result to the Parent OBR and OBX.

If OBR-26 (Parent Result) is valued, then there SHALL be at least one OBX in the message where OBX-3 (Observation Identifier) = OBR-26.1 (Parent Observation Identifier) AND OBX-4 (Observation Sub-ID) = OBR-26.2 (Parent Observation Sub-identifier)

If OBR-29 (Parent) is valued, then there SHALL be at least one other OBR in the message where OBR-2 (Placer Order Number) = OBR-29.1 (Placer Assigned Identifier) AND OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) = OBR-29.2 (Filler Assigned Identifier)
Results with a Parent/Child relationship (as defined in section 6.1.1), such as Microbiology and Reflex Results must provide proper linking from the Child result to the Parent OBR and OBX.

If OBR-26 (Parent Result) is valued, then there SHALL be at least one OBX in the message where OBX-3 (Observation Identifier) = OBR-26.1 (Parent Observation Identifier) AND OBX-4 (Observation Sub-ID) = OBR-26.2 (Parent Observation Sub-identifier)

If OBR-29 (Parent) is valued, then there SHALL be at least one other OBR in the message where OBR-2 (Placer Order Number) = OBR-29.1 (Placer Assigned Identifier) AND OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) = OBR-29.2 (Filler Assigned Identifier)

If OBR-50 (Parent Universal Service Identifier) is valued, then there SHALL be at least one other OBR in the message where OBR-4 (Universal Service Identifier) = OBR-50 (Parent Universal Service Identifier)
The value of SPM-1 (Set ID - SPM) SHALL be valued sequentially starting the value '1' within a given segment group.
The value of OBX-1 (Set ID - OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting the value '1' within a given segment group.
The value of ORC-2 (Placer Order Number) SHALL be identical to the value of OBR-2 (Placer Order Number) within the same Order_Observation Group instance.
The value of ORC-3 (Filler Order Number) SHALL be identical to the value of OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) within the same Order_Observation Group instance.
The value of ORC-12 (Ordering Provider) SHALL be identical to the value of OBR-16 (Ordering Provider) within the same Order_Observation Group instance.
The value of OBR-1 (Set ID - OBR) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1' across the Order_Observation Groups.

If there are multiple OBX segments associated with the same OBR segment that have the same OBX-3 (Observation Identifier) values for (OBX-3.1 (Identifier) + OBX-3.3 (Name of Coding System)) or (OBX-3.4 (Alternate Identifier) + OBX-3.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System)), a combination of (OBX-3.1 + OBX3.3) or (OBX-3.4 + OBX-3.6) and OBX-4 SHALL create a unique identification under a single OBR.

If one or more SPM segments are present for the same OBR, then the earliest SPM-17.1 (Range Start Date/Time) SHALL be equal to or before OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time) and OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time) SHALL be equal to or before the latest SPM-17.2 (Range End Date/Time).

If one or more SPM segments are present for the same OBR and if OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time) is present, OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time) SHALL be equal to or before the latest SPM-17.2 (Range End Date/Time).
The value of ORC-31 (Parent Universal Service Identifier) SHALL be identical to the value of OBR-50 (Parent Universal Service Identifier).
The value of OBR-50 (Parent Universal Service Identifier) SHALL be identical to the value of ORC-31 (Parent Universal Service Identifier).

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.3.1' (LRI_GU_FRU_Profile) or three occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.16 (LRI_Common_Component), '2.16.840.1.113883.9.12' (LRI_GU_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.83' (LAB_FRU_Component) in any order.
The value of ORC-3 (Filler Order Number) SHALL NOT be valued identical to another instance of ORC-3 (Filler Order Number) in the same message excluding the Prior Result group(s).
The value of OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) SHALL NOT be valued identical to another instance of OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) in the message.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.3.2' (LRI_GU_FRN_Profile) or three occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.16 (LRI_Common_Component), '2.16.840.1.113883.9.12' (LRI_GU_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.84' (LAB_FRN_Component) in any order.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.3.3' (LRI_NG_FRU_Profile) or three occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.16' (LRI_Common_Component), '2.16.840.1.113883.9.13' (LRI_NG_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.83' (LAB_FRU_Component) in any order.
The value of ORC-3 (Filler Order Number) SHALL NOT be valued identical to another instance of ORC-3 (Filler Order Number) in the same message excluding the Prior Result group(s).
The value of OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) SHALL NOT be valued identical to another instance of OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) in the message.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.3.4' (LRI_NG_FRN_Profile) or three occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.16' (LRI_Common_Component), '2.16.840.1.113883.9.13' (LRI_NG_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.84' (LAB_FRN_Component) in any order.

MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.21' (GU_Acknowledgment_Profile) when acknowledging ORU GU Profiles where MSH-21 contains '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.3.1' (LRI_GU_FRU_Profile), or '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.3.2' (LRI_GU_FRN_Profile), or '2.16.840.1.113883.9.12' (LRI_GU_Component).

MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.25' (NG_Acknowledgment_Profile) when acknowledging LRI IG conformant results messages ORU NG Profiles where MSH-21 contains '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.3.3' (LRI_NG_FRU_Profile), or '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.3.4' (LRI_NG_FRN_Profile), or '2.16.840.1.113883.9.13' (LRI_NG_Component).
